name: mylang-lsp-client
description: VS Code language client that connects to your custom Language Server (diagnostics, completion, go-to, references, hover, rename, symbols).

lspLang.languageId.description: The VS Code language id to bind the client to (matches your files).

lspLang.server.mode.description: How to connect to your language server: launch a process (stdio) or connect over TCP.

lspLang.server.command.description: Path to your language server executable (used in stdio mode).

lspLang.server.args.description: Arguments to pass to the language server (stdio mode).

lspLang.server.tcp.host.description: Host of the language server (tcp mode).

lspLang.server.tcp.port.description: Port of the language server (tcp mode).

lspLang.trace.server.description: LSP JSON-RPC trace level from the server.
